thread.title: Week ahead: counting on the consumer for growth?

title: Week ahead: counting on the consumer for growth?
text:
Week ahead: counting on the consumer for growth? 5:16pm BST - 01:38 
The consumer is under the spotlight as a raft of retail and inflation data this week gives the latest reading on the euro zone and Japan's recoveries. Ciara Lee reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The consumer is under the spotlight as a raft of retail and inflation data this week gives the latest reading on the euro zone and Japan's recoveries. Ciara Lee reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2pDYE0G
